report.title: Auto-checked verification data
report.description: List of occurrences for verification with support for mapping the occurrences and the verification check system.
report.query: SELECT #columns# FROM cache_occurrences o JOIN samples s on s.id=o.sample_id JOIN websites w on w.id=o.website_id LEFT JOIN locations l ON l.id=s.location_id LEFT JOIN (select occurrence_id, generated_by, max(comment) as comment from occurrence_comments where deleted=false AND implies_manual_check_required=true group by occurrence_id, generated_by ) oc ON oc.occurrence_id=o.id #agreements_join# #joins# WHERE #sharing_filter# AND (o.id=#id# OR #id# = 0) AND (CAST(o.survey_id AS character varying)='#survey_id#' OR '#survey_id#'='' OR #id#<>0) AND (trim('#date_from#')='' OR '#date_from#'='Click here' OR o.date_end >= CAST(COALESCE('#date_from#','1500-01-01') as date) OR #id#<>0) AND (trim('#date_to#')='' OR '#date_to#'='Click here' OR o.date_start <= CAST(COALESCE('#date_to#','1500-01-01') as date) OR #id#<>0) AND (o.record_status = '#record_status#' OR '#record_status#' = 'all' OR #id#<>0) AND ( ('#rule#'='') OR ('#rule#'='all' AND oc.occurrence_id is not null) OR (oc.generated_by = 'verification_check_#rule#') OR ('#rule#'='none' AND oc.occurrence_id is null) OR #id#<>0 ) AND ('#searchArea#'='' OR st_intersects(s.geom, st_geomfromtext('#searchArea#',900913))) #idlist# #order_by#

param.name: id
param.description: Enter the ID of a record to view or leave blank for all records. If you specify an ID then the other parameters are ignored.

param.name: survey_id
param.description: Select the survey, or leave for all surveys

param.name: date_from
param.description: Start of the date range to return records for, or leave blank.

param.name: date_to
param.description: End of the date range to return records for, or leave blank.

param.name: smpattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of sample attribute IDs to include

param.name: occattrs
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence attribute IDs to include

param.name: record_status
param.description: Select the record status to view data for

param.name: rule
param.description: Select the rules to view records for
param.lookup_values: all:All violations,none:Clean records,period_within_year:Period within year,period_within_year_breeding:Breeding period,period:Period,species_designation:Designated species

param.name: idlist
param.description: Comma separated list of occurrence IDs to filter to.

param.name: expertise_location
param.description: Provide the location in which your expertise applies
param.join: JOIN locations lexpert ON st_intersects(lexpert.boundary_geom, s.geom) AND lexpert.id=#expertise_location#

param.name: expertise_taxon_groups
param.description: List of taxon group IDs which the user has expertise in
param.join: JOIN taxon_groups tg ON tg.id=o.taxon_group_id AND tg.id IN (#expertise_taxon_groups#)
